alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Clark, north central Pike and central Montgomery Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mauldin to near Glenwood. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Glenwood... Norman... Mauldin... Black Springs... Salem in Pike County... Gibbs... Welsh... Silver... Sims... Story... Hurricane Grove... Caddo Gap... Washita... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
